wallet.disconnectConfirmBody: You are connected on Sui. Do you want to disconnect now?

landing.title: Publish, sell and scale your AI models
landing.subtitle: Monetize with perpetual licenses or subscriptions. Secure delivery with IPFS and encryption.
landing.benefitsSubtitle: Security, speed and control to scale your AI model business.

benefits.title: Secure ownership
benefits.desc: Tokenized licenses with automated, verifiable enforcement.

benefits.title: Instant payments
benefits.desc: Settlements in seconds with low fees.

benefits.title: IPFS + encryption
benefits.desc: Protected delivery with IPFS and AES-GCM.

benefits.title: API or download
benefits.desc: Sell API access and/or perpetual downloads.

steps.title: Publish your model
steps.desc: Upload image and artifact, set pricing and rights.

steps.title: List on the marketplace
steps.desc: Both prices (perpetual and subscription) in one listing.

testimonials.name: Ana, AI creator
testimonials.quote: In 10 minutes I published and sold my first model. The flow is spotless.

testimonials.name: Luis, ML startup
testimonials.quote: Subscriptions gave us recurring revenue from week one.

testimonials.name: Caro, data scientist
testimonials.quote: IPFS + encryption gave me confidence to share private models.

ctaFinal.title: Start today
ctaFinal.subtitle: Publish your first model in minutes and enable global sales.

index.title: Publishing wizard
index.subtitle: Complete these steps to publish your model.

connectModal.title: Connect your wallet to continue
connectModal.body: To start the wizard we need to verify your account. This connection is secure and you can disconnect at any time.

step1.title: Step 1 · Model identity
step1.subtitle: Present your model: name, summary, cover and classification.

identity.title: Identity
identity.help: These fields make your model easy to understand and find.

cover.title: Cover
cover.help: Pick an image that represents your model.

classification.title: Classification
classification.help: Help discovery with relevant categories and tags.

authorship.title: Authorship
authorship.help: Public author information for the model.

name.label: Name
name.helper: Use a clear and concise title.

socials.title: Author links
socials.helper: Optional. Add your links to show on the model page.

cover.helper: Select a cover (recommended 3:2 or 16:9). Formats: PNG, JPEG or WEBP. Max 5 MB.
cover.errorFormat: Format not allowed (use PNG, JPEG or WEBP)
cover.removedSlow: Cover removed (unpin may take a while)

confirm.removeCover: Remove current cover? CIDs will be unpinned in your pinning service.

step2.title: Step 2 · Customer-facing sheet
step2.subtitle: Describe the value, use cases, inputs/outputs and expected outcomes. Technical configuration can be added later.

placeholders.valueProp: What problem it solves and why it's better?
placeholders.description: Explain in simple terms how it helps

step2.validationFillClientSheet: Complete the customer sheet (title, description and at least one industry or use case)

preview.title: Preview
preview.help: Public-facing preview of the model sheet

helps.capabilities: Tasks and modalities covered by the model
helps.dependencies: Required Python packages (comma or newline separated)

step3.title: Step 3 · Package artifacts and test the demo
step3.subtitle: Upload your model files to IPFS (automatic CID and hash), add notes if needed and validate an input preset to run a hosted demo.

artifacts.title: Artifacts (IPFS)
artifacts.help: Upload your model files; we generate the CID automatically

demo.title: Demo (Hosted)
demo.help: The demo runs on our infrastructure

actions.typesMax: Types: safetensors, bin, pt, onnx, gguf, json, zip, tar, gz, bz2, xz. Max: 200 MB.

step4.title: Step 4 · Define licenses and terms
step4.subtitle: Set prices, usage rights and legal conditions. This data will be used when publishing the model.

prices.title: Prices
prices.help: Reference values. You may leave 0 if not applicable.

rights.title: Rights and delivery
rights.help: Select how the model can be used and delivered.

terms.title: Terms
terms.help: Write or paste your terms. Compute Hash generates a SHA‑256 fingerprint of this text to anchor the version and detect changes.

alerts.onePrice: Define at least one price (> 0): Perpetual or Subscription.

legends.rights: Define what the customer can do: API-only, artifact download, or both.
legends.delivery: How it will be provided (hosted API or file download). Does not change legal rights.
legends.rightsDelivery: Choose API-only, artifact download, or both. Delivery selects how it’s provided (hosted API or file). Does not change legal rights.

helpers.termsText: Summarize key clauses (use, attribution, updates). You can paste or edit.

validation.durationRequired: Required if there is a subscription
validation.chooseRight: You must choose at least one right: API and/or Download.
validation.termsMustBeSigned: Please sign the Terms before continuing.

step5.title: Step 5 · Review and publish
step5.subtitle: Review the summary and publish to the selected networks. We build the metadata automatically from previous steps.

issues.artifacts: You must have at least one artifact with CID.
issues.rights: Select at least one right: API and/or Download (Step 4).
issues.onePrice: Define at least one price (> 0) in licenses (Step 4).
issues.subNeedsDuration: If using subscription, define base duration (> 0).

step0.title: Welcome to the publishing wizard
step0.subtitle: In a few minutes you will prepare your model to sell it globally in 5 simple steps.

pitch.title: Why complete the 5 steps?
pitch.body: Finishing the wizard creates a professional, trustworthy and conversion‑ready listing. With clear value, technical details and pricing, buyers will feel confident to purchase and start using your model right away.

value.title: Value & clarity
value.desc: Explain what your model solves and what makes it different.

trust.title: Trust & compliance
trust.desc: Show formats, requirements and limitations clearly.

growth.title: Growth & monetization
growth.desc: Unlock API and/or download delivery with flexible pricing.

steps.title: What you'll complete
steps.subtitle: Overview of the 5 steps before you start

detail.expectedImpact: The expected impact on your business
detail.noExamples: The creator has not added examples yet.
detail.noDemo: This model has no demo configured.
detail.deliveryHint: How you get the model: API, download, or both
detail.transferableHint: , you may transfer the license as allowed by the terms.
detail.wrongNetwork: Wrong network. Please switch to the target network.
detail.marketAddressMissing: Marketplace address is not configured for this network.
detail.loadingModelBody: One moment please, we are preparing the information.
